page.title: 06Population-Biddestone
page.content: Because this is an attractive area there is an inflow of people who can pay high prices for houses. This includes a high proportion of retired people. Because of the decline in employment in this rural area, increased house prices, and poor public transport there has been an outflow of younger people seeking jobs, housing and other amenities. At the same time, the older members of the community who have roots in the area are becoming fewer in number. This shift in population has lead to other changes such a considerable reduction in the number of children at the village school.There are now only 27 pupils. Meanwhile there is constant employment for building craftsmen who specialise in renovating old cottages.
